snippet.title: TetroCrate 2.2.6: 3D Block Puzzle
snippet.description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.beyondinfinity.tetrocrate

https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1113468049?mt=8

TetroCrate is a 3D block puzzle -  think a cross between classic tetris and tangram puzzle.

How to play:
• Drag the blocks to move them.
• Tap to fit blocks into the empty space to complete vertical or horizontal lines.
• Full lines disappear from the game board, just like in classic brick games.
• Bonus for clearing multiple brick lines.

This block puzzle has 2 play modes:
• Revolver: blocks can be rotated, many levels & block shapes.
• Challenge: no rotations, only tetromino shapes, has a different best game strategy.
